Thanks for taking the time to improve ChatSuite. Please describe your idea
below. If your request involves sensitive user data or policies that impact
community moderation, please review `CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md`. For confidential or
sensitive reports, email the maintainers at `hubertus@hubertusbecker.com`
instead of opening a public issue.
